name: Rivalries 2
description:
This rivalry requires two games as there are so many moving parts. Everyone seems to want a piece of Chris' cock. We have Angelica, Chris' best friend's girlfriend, and then Lola, Chris' bestfriend's daughter and Evelyn another hottie who wants her cherry popped by Chris. The man has a dick in demand.

Before playing Rivalries Part 2, you need to finish Rivalries Part 1 and get the access code at the end of the game in part one.

Instructions: Each time the cursor is visible you will have to carry out an action. You will have to click the hot spot. Keep the mouse clicked on that area and you will see the pleasure bar start to function and rise. A double click is required where you are to find a hot spot as well, But when you release the click the cursor is visible again which means the action is not yet finished and you must quickly find the next hot spot to get that pleasure bar back up. Some hot spots require a click and a move. So, click and then move the mouse around without releasing the click over where the action must happen.  And last the click and go, which is a click and a move of the mouse in a coming and going action.
